column2: Heavily breathing and balled up in the corner of the cage--little movement
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor was on the smaller side and located directly on top of the skull. Skull was still intact.
Heart and Lungs were enveloped inside a solid tumor.
